name: Magic Forest 2.0
description:
Find all 26 letters in the MAGIC FOREST!

GAMEPLAY

Use 'w a s d' to move, 'space' to jump, 'shift' to run, 'esc' to quit.

4+

BUGS FIXING

  • improved sounds
  • character does not drop out of the level
  • better UI
  • improver graphics and level design
  • improved some technical bugs
